bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXXXI (Nos 5258-5289)
bibl.seg: J.H. Brusuelas & C. Meccariello, with contributions by S. Bocksberger, C. Cheung, C. Chrysanthou, A. De Marinis, K.F. Funderburk, S.P.C. Hendriks, M. Herrero, T.C. Hoklotubbe, C. Iturralde, B. Landau, E. Marquis, J. Shao, F. Schironi, Ph. Schmitz, A. Schulz, G.S. Smith, D. Squire, A. Syrkou, Y. Trnka-Amrhein, G. Verhasselt, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXXXI (Nos 5258-5289) = Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 102.
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2016, xii-167 pp., figg. ISBN 978-0-85698-229-3. Â£85.

P. Oxy. LXXXI, 5258-5289. - Pp. v-vi: Preface (D. Obbink). - I. Theological Texts (5258-5260). - II. New Literary Texts (5261-5264). - III. Known Literary Texts (5265-5280). - IV. Subliterary Texts (5281-5285). - V. Documentary Texts (5286-5289).
C.R. par Patrick James, CR N.S., 68 (2018) pp. 395-398. - J.K. Elliott, JThS 70 (2019) pp. 842-844. - Francisca A.J. Hoogendijk, JEA 104 (2018) pp. 247-248.
